Event: Naeemul Hassan gave a talk in the 37th HCIL Symposium.
Alhamdulillah! Our paper titled "Varying amounts of information in health news headlines can affect user selection and interactivity" has been accepted in AEJMC 2020
Alhamdulillah! Our paper titled "A Benchmark Dataset of Check-worthy Factual Claims" has been accepted at the International AAAI Conference on Web and Social Media (ICWSM 2020)
Naeemul Hassan will be in a panel discussing "Fighting Disinformation to Save Democracy".
Alhamdulillah! Our paper titled "Towards Automated Sexual Violence Report Tracking" has been accepted at the International AAAI Conference on Web and Social Media (ICWSM 2020)
Alhamdulillah! Our paper titled "Understanding the Challenges for Bangladeshi Women to Participate in #MeToo Movement" has been accepted in ACM GROUP 2020
Alhamdulillah! Our paper titled "Towards Domain-Specific Characterization of Misinformation" has been accepted in AAAI Fall Symposium Series 2019
Alhamdulillah! Our paper titled "Examining the Role of Clickbait Headlines to Engage Readers with Reliable Health-related Information" has been accepted in AAAI Fall Symposium Series 2019
Yoo yeon Sung (Sophie) is joining our lab as a new iSchool Ph.D. student from Fall 2020.
